member.summary: A variation of the Point chart type, where the data points are replaced by bubbles of different sizes.

The name of the data set.
The maximum size of the bubble radius as a percentage of the chart area size. Any integer from 0 to 100.
The minimum size of the bubble radius as a percentage of the chart area size. Any integer from 0 to 100.
The maximum bubble size, which is a percentage of the chart area that is set by BubbleMaxSize. Any double.
The minimum bubble size, which is a percentage of the chart area that is set by BubbleMinSize. Any double.
Use the bubble size as the data point label.
